none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on November 25, 2014 Description from Terminal Escape:
No more brutality. No more murder. No more getting away with it because you're a cop. We keep saying the same things over and over again, yes....but we keep saying the same things because the things are still fukkd. I'm a grown ass man, and I teeter between complete disillusion and complete fury. This demo is really good, and I need this. XNO MOREX
//2.bp.blogspot.com/-PKEphWyLNzM/VHQXOIScL8I/AAAAAAAALOQ/TemJFIYJK_I/s1600/no%2Bmore%2Bcover.jpg //4.bp.blogspot.com/-RUQP9hUAAcw/VHQYPZmwCFI/AAAAAAAALOY/aeez3thNfTI/s1600/no%2Bmore%2Bimg%2Bcopy.jpg
